product_name: The North Face Warm Long Underwear Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With quick-drying, breathable fabric, The North Face Warm long underwear tights for women provide great warmth and moisture managment during low-to-medium intensity activities in cold weather. Midweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams which are designed to enhance motion. The women's North Face Warm long underwear tights offer a relaxed next-to-skin fit; elastic waist. Closeout.
short_description: With quick-drying, breathable fabric, The North Face Warm long underwear tights for women provide great warmth and moisture managment during low-to-medium intensity activities in cold weather.
